question: Which of the following won the 2nd South Asian Basketball SABA Under - 16 Championship?
explanation: India won 2nd South Asian Basketball, SABA, Under - 16 Championship. They defeated Bhutan by 131-50 in its last league match at Kathmandu in Nepal. India now qualified for 2017 International Basketball Federation, FIBA, Under-16 Asian Championship to be played in Malaysia later this year.
